summary: Defines an abstract base class that specifies the contract for collective communication operations used by Lightning Fabric plugins, covering group lifecycle management, synchronization primitives, and tensor data exchange across multiple processes and nodes.
business_intent: Provide a backend‑agnostic, extensible interface that enables distributed deep‑learning workloads to perform collective operations (e.g., broadcast, all‑reduce, gather) consistently, simplifying integration of custom communication backends within the Lightning Fabric ecosystem.
